article.title: AeroVironment Supports Puma Unmanned Aircraft
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: AeroVironment Incorporated, Simi Valley, California, was recently awarded a $17 million contract that establishes not-to-exceed amounts for Puma all-environment capable variant contractor logistics support, training and accounting for contract services in support of Joint Urgent Operational Need Statement CC-0289, entitled, "Unmanned Aircraft Systems for Route Clearance."Â U.S. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
